tool_description: Creates detailed work orders for HVAC maintenance tasks with assigned resources, timelines, and specifications.

schedule_id.description: Schedule ID from maintenance schedule generator

maintenance_type.description: Type of maintenance (preventive, corrective, emergency, inspection)

priority_level.description: Work order priority (low, medium, high, critical)

estimated_cost.description: Estimated total cost for the work order

error_messages: Invalid schedule reference: schedule_id not found in the system.
Invalid equipment reference: equipment_id not found in registered equipment.
Invalid technician assignment: assigned_technician_id not found or unavailable.
Invalid duration: estimated_duration_hours must be between 0.5 and 8.0 hours.
Invalid maintenance type: Use one of [preventive, corrective, emergency, inspection].
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Invalid start time: scheduled_start_time must be a valid future ISO 8601 date-time.
usage: Provide schedule_id, equipment_id, assigned_technician_id, scheduled_start_time, estimated_duration_hours, and maintenance_type. Optionally add required_parts, special_instructions, priority_level, and estimated_cost to create comprehensive work orders.

creation_timestamp.description: When the work order was created

resource_requirements_summary.description: Summary of technician, parts, and time requirements
